mapper.update: UPDATE SALES_POST SET POST_TITLE=#{post_title}, POST_PRICE=#{post_price}, POST_CONTENTS=#{post_contents}, POST_ADDRESS=#{post_address} , POST_TAGS=#{post_tags}, POST_CODE=#{post_code} where POST_NO=#{post_no}
UPDATE SALES_POST SET POST_YN = #{onSaleUp} WHERE POST_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, r.POST_NO, r.POST_TITLE, r.ID, r.ALERT_CNT, r.ALERT_CONTENTS from (select S.POST_NO, POST_TITLE, S.ID, S.ALERT_CNT, ALERT_CONTENTS FROM SALES_POST s LEFT OUTER JOIN ALERT_POST a ON a.POST_NO = s.POST_NO order by s.alert_cnt desc, post_no desc) r where rownum <= (#{pageNum}*#{amount}) ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, P.*FROM (SELECT * FROM SALES_POST WHERE ID =#{id} ORDER BY POST_NO DESC)P) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, P.*FROM (SELECT * FROM SALES_POST WHERE ID = #{Pid} ORDER BY POST_NO DESC)P) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 5+(#{more}*4) AND 8+(#{more}*4)
